title: Praying Funeral Prayer for women
transcript: she says what is the ruling on praying a funeral prayer for women this is totally permissible the Companions female companions may allah be pleased with them they offered a funeral prayer to the prophet alayhi salatu salam and offering funeral prayer is sunnah and it's highly recommended and there's great reward on it what is not permissible is for a woman to follow a funeral until it is buried or to visit a graveyard this is an issue of dispute among scholars the most authentic opinion is that it is not permissible
